content: network connectivity functions for z/VSE, z/TPF, and Linux on IBM Z are listed in Table 7-9. Table 7-9 Supported network connectivity functions for z/VSE, z/TPF, and Linux on IBM Z f. CHPID types OSM, OSN, OSX are no longer supported. g. Statements of Direction: IBM z16 will be the last IBM Z server to support OSA Express 1000BASE-T hardware adapters. h. Require PTFs for APARs OA55256 (IBM VTAM) and PI95703 (TCP/IP). i. Require PTF for APAR PI99085. j. Statements of Direction: IBM z16 will be the last IBM Z server to support the OSE CHPID type.
